author: Anonymous
category: 诡秘之主 - 爱潜水的乌贼 | Lord of the Mysteries - Cuttlefish that Loves Diving
characters: Merlin Hermes, Mr. Fool (Lord of the Mysteries), Tarot Club (Lord of the Mysteries)
description:
A collection of tales, all featuring one very chaotic, very unreasonable Merlin Hermes.

Ch1

There is a white bird on Mr Fool’s chair. To be more specific, it is a dove, but it also appeared to be a Beyonder creature.

After the Tarot Club had a quick but intense staring competition, it was decided, nonverbally, that the person who would be asking Mr Fool what it was was Miss Justice, who Mr Fool seemed to favor the most after the World.

Mr World, on the other hand, seemed to be trying his best not to laugh, Justice Audrey thought, as she opened her mouth to speak.

“Honorable Mr Fool,” she began. “Might we inquire as to the nature of the bird next to you?”

Out of the corner of her eye, she saw the Hanged Man twitch at the use of “we”.

“Oh?” He said, humming slightly. He rapped his knuckles gently on the wood.

“This is my son.” He said, like it was the simplest thing in the world.

The white dove with orange eyes blinked back at them, before opening its beak and laughing.

Or: Merlin Hermes crashes into a Tarot Club meeting. Everything goes as well as you would expect, which means not at all.
